about_the_game:
What happens when the fundamental laws of magic are shattered?

Ikode: Legacy of the Elements is a classic JRPG that follows Alex, a young boy plagued by unsettling dreams of being watched. One fateful night, Alex’s fears become reality when an intruder breaks into his home, attempting to cast a dark spell on him. The mysterious figure escapes into a nearby forest, and Alex, joined by his best friend Elene, ventures after him.

In the heart of the forest, they stumble upon the intruder and a group of hooded figures engaged in a forbidden ritual to merge two elemental forces—an act that defies the teachings of the renowned magic academy that Elene attends. To their shock, the ritual succeeds in creating a monstrous fusion of the two elements, their combined power amplifying each other in ways never before seen.

As Alex, Elene, and their friends embark on a perilous journey, they are forced to question everything they know about magic and the very fabric of their universe.

Features:

  • A mystery that deepens as the storyline progresses
  • Many side areas to explore with secrets to uncover
  • Many ways to customize your party's skills and equipment
  • 7 party members that join your forces, each with their own combat specialties
  • Unlock class specializations for each character allowing for further customization
  • Outrageously difficult secret bosses that require you to unlock your character's potential
  • An original soundtrack composed by Eric Francis which is available as RPG Maker Official DLC!
